cause.description:
Breast Cancer is increasing at a high rate. Many believe this fatal disease only targets elderly women; that is not true. A monthly check up can save you from it. You have nothing to lose. Check yourself!
1. It is worth it to protect yourself.
2. You can also save your family and friends.
3. Raise awareness about the causes.
cause.mission: Detect cancer at an early stage
cause.name: Breast Cancer Support
